pullRequest.body:
This version assumes that the cosine is not zero.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7727111195/job/21064874057)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7727111195/job/21064873533)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7727111195/job/21064873308)
Could you take this occasion to swap the right hand side to `k * π / 2 = θ`? Same thing in the next lemma.
Done (for tangent, not for other trig functions).

```suggestion
/-- The tangent of a complex number is equal to zero
```

```suggestion
/-- If the tangent of a complex number is well-defined,
```
Could you also add the real version, for symmetry?

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Trigonometric): add `Complex.tan_eq_zero_iff'`
